GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.23 to before v4.9.331
GSD.description:
sh: machvec: Use char[] for section boundaries

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.331 by commit 6b436d2e98509f04d72fa79da23b2505c52116cd, it was introduced in version v2.6.23 by commit 9655ad03af2d232c3b26e7562ab4f8c29b107e49. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: sh: machvec: Use char[] for section boundaries
